author: Simon Difford
description: Temperature is key to the enjoyment of this modern classic. Consume while icy cold and you'll enjoy a clean and crisp Martini.
name: Vodkatini / Vodka Martini

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE (or STIR) all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass

video.description: Temperature is key to the enjoyment of this modern classic. Consume while icy cold and you'll enjoy a clean and crisp Martini.
video.name: HOWTO make Vodkatini / Vodka Martini
